Name: Tequila Club
Ingredients: 10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: The similarity of ingredients in this tequila-based riff on the classic Pegu Club to the Margarita are obvious, so it's not surprising the finished drink is reminiscent of a Margarita, only lighter with the lime notes a lot subtler. As well as the tequila, orange curaçao shines in this drink.
History: Created in February 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Tequila Club contains 179 calories
